pkgmetadata.longdescription: Forecasting age-sex-country-cause mortality rates // Software accompanying the book by Girosi and King: Demographic Forecasting. Four different forecast models (i.e, OLS, LC, POISSON, and MAP). The driver of the simulation is function mortality.driver(), with your choices of input parameters, such as country, disease, and gender, and many others; please read the software manual.
